summary: David Joshua Azrieli,  was a Polish-born Canadian-Israeli real estate tycoon, developer, designer, architect, and philanthropist.
full_text: David Joshua Azrieli, CM CQ  was a Canadian-Israeli real estate tycoon, developer, designer, architect, and philanthropist. With an estimated net worth of $US 3.1 billion , Azrieli was ranked by Forbes as the 9th wealthiest Canadian and 401st in the world.
title: David Azrieli
